div.pre: 1027 Akhali Abastumani, Zugdidi raion, Georgia, 1935 Burial: before 325 B.C. (Golenko, Kapa- nadze) Contents: AR. Pot hoard Colchis: hemidr. Disposition: Zugdidi Pakhomov III, 642 (reports two hds. found at the same place and apparently the same time) â€ Zograph, "Nakhodky," 54
